pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hybrid Genetic and Simulated Annealing for Variable Selection // We provide a stage-wise selection method using genetic algorithms, designed to efficiently identify main and two-way interactions within high-dimensional linear regression models. Additionally, it implements simulated annealing algorithms during the mutation process. The relevant paper can be found at: Ye, C.,and Yang,Y. (2019) doi:10.1109/TIT.2019.2913417.
